transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Hanji.
Good morning sir, Tanushri baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Hanji bataiye.
Hanji, sir actually aapka ek account hai HD painters. To uske regarding maine connect kiya tha. Abhi first level se baat karne ke liye.
Hanji mam bataiye.
Hanji. Sir actually mujhe update deni thi ki aapka ye jo account hai iska service na live ho chuka hai. And service to live ho chuka hai but isme jo category hota hai kuch na kuch active karna hota hai.
Hanji.
Taki buyleads proper aaye aur aapka lead generate hona start ho jaye. To mai jaan sakti hu ki isko aap dekhenge ya koi aur dekhenge?
Mam mai dekhunga. Wo jinse ID banwai hai Nikhil bhaiya se wo aaj aayenge.
Achha. To matlab aap lead ka jo consume karna hoga ya fir jo matlab guidance dena hoga to wo aapko aapke through connect karna chahiye ya fir aapne jinka naam bataya unse connect karna chahiye?
Nahi nahi mam jaise aapne kya bola abhi?
Buyleads consume karna hota hai. Daily base pe aapko teen char karke buyleads consume karna hota hai. Aur inquiry ya jo calls aata hai wo bhi kaha se aapko check karna hoga usko bhi guide karna hai mujhe.
Nahi mam wo nahi karunga.
Achha aap hi karenge. To sir agar abhi possible ho kabhi video meeting karna to abhi aapko mai link share kar dungi.
Nahi mam abhi nahi ho payega.
To time bata dijiye sir.
Mam aap kar lena 2 se 3 baje ke beech mein.
To to three time us time na hum logo ka lunch time hota hai to uske pehle ya fir ke baad.
Thik hai mam uske baad kar lena.
Kis time?
4 baje kar lena.
Thik hai aur aap apna WhatsApp number ek baar bata denge sir to mai aapko link share kar dungi waha pe.
Thik hai. Ek baar bata dijiye.
Kya?
Aap ek baar aapka WhatsApp number bata dijiye mai video meeting ka link bhi share kar dungi aapko waha pe. Mam same number hai ye 790.
Ek second 790.
7632
7632
927
Okay na aapka naam sir?
Visu Chauhan.
Kya sir?
Visu Chauhan.
Thik hai. Mai na sir aapko is number pe ek baar 4 baje se pehle na ek baar message drop kar dungi. Aur aapne sir kal mujhe call kiya tha ya fir sir ne call kiya tha kal aapko?
Bhai band kar de yaar iska. Kya bol rahi ho mam?
Aapne ek baar call kiya tha ki is number pe mujhe?
Nahi mam maine to nahi kiya.
Achha actually yaha pe dikha raha tha ki call aaya tha aapke side se. To koi baat nahi to yaha pe call aaya tha isliye maine socha aap se connect bhi kar lu to mai yaha pe na complaint jo hota hai usme close kar du to fir? Kyuki aap se connect bhi ho gaye already and 4 baje ka video meeting bhi schedule ho gaya hai.
Thik hai mam. Thik hai.
Okay sir thank you. Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive needs to update about account service.

- Customer needs guidance on buyleads consumption.



Resolution:

- Video meeting scheduled for 4:00 PM.

- Customer shared WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share meeting link before 4:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account, buyleads, video meeting, whatsapp number
